In a quaint village, nestled between rolling hills, there stood an ancient clock tower. Unlike any other, this clock could speak. Each hour, it chimed not just with the sound of bells but with words of wisdom. “At one, seize the moment,” it would say, while at three, it whispered, “Time is a river; flow with it.” Villagers gathered, enchanted by its tales. One day, a hurried traveler stumbled upon the clock, frustrated by his late arrival. The clock spoke gently, “Patience, dear friend, for time is not just to be spent but to be cherished.” The traveler smiled, transformed.
